text: Russell "Russ" B. Mayberry (December 22, 1925 - July 27, 2012) was a Scottish- American television director who directed Dallas, Matlock, Star Trek: The Next Generation, I Dream of Jeannie, and Kojak. Mayberry was born on December 22, 1925 in Glasgow, Scotland. He was raised in Chicago, Illinois. He studied at Northwestern University. Mayberry was married to Sandy Mayberry until his death in 2012. They had two children. Mayberry died on July 27, 2012 in Fort Collins, Colorado from an illness, aged 86. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1925 births Category:2012 deaths Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:American television directors Category:Businesspeople from Chicago
title: Russ Mayberry
